dmca.title: TV DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google: Android Market

works.description:
Marvel Entertainment, LLC and its  
subsidiaries ("Marvel") is the owner of the copyrights, trademarks, and  
other intellectual property rights in The Avengers, Thor, Iron Man, Hulk, 

Captain America, Black Widow, Hawkeye, and over 8,000 other popular  
characters. Marvel owns and controls the rights to use and merchandise the
 
names, designs, logos and likenesses affiliated with all of its characters
 
and associated properties.

The apps identified in this complaint were not granted any license or  
authorization to use images or any other trademarked or copyrighted  
property involving The Avengers, Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor,  
Black Widow, Hawkeye, or any other Marvel characters.  Consequently, these
 
apps infringe Marvel's valuable intellectual property rights.
